maps.name: My Neighborhood
maps.description: A well balanced map based off my childhood neighborhood where the real life version of this game was invented.

maps.name: The Park
maps.description: A neighborhood with parks and lots of cover. It's your choice whether to hide... or RUN!

maps.name: Suburbia
maps.description: Long game for a lot of players. Work through apartment complexes and parks. Do you dare take the shortcut?

maps.name: Greenway
maps.description: A neighborhood with a central park running the whole length and ringed by roads. Foot cops will be doing a lot of work in there!

maps.name: Straight Line
maps.description: Short and chaotic, not particularly well balanced, but still fun with a lot of Fugitives.
